short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows a countdown to Christmas.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hiya, we're Parachute, a web design and digital agency in Glasgow. We love a bit of the Christmas spirit and have designed a Chrome web extension to help you count down to the big day.
